snippet: “Prints Please,” an exhibition of prints made by the publisher Universal Limited Art Editions, is being held through March 25 at the Islip Art Museum.
abstract: Prints Please, an exhibition of prints made by the Long Island publisher Universal Limited Art Editions, is at the Islip Art Museum; exhibition is intended to celebrate the history of the publisher as a prominent local arts business (Metropolitan/Long Island).
lead_paragraph: “Prints Please,” an exhibition of prints made by the publisher Universal Limited Art Editions, is being held through March 25 at the Islip Art Museum.

headline.seo: Exhibition Focuses on Publisher of Art Prints
headline.main: Making Prints, and Leaving an Impact
headline.print_headline: Making Prints, and Leaving an Impact
